## blockRendering.BottomRow class

An object containing information about what elements are in the bottom row of a block as well as spacing information for the bottom row. Elements in a bottom row can consist of corners, spacers and next connections.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class BottomRow extends Row 
```
<b>Extends:</b> Row

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `BottomRow` class.

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [baseline](./blockly.blockrendering.bottomrow.baseline.md) |  | number | The Y position of the bottom edge of the block, relative to the origin of the block rendering. |

|  [hasRightSquareCorner(\_block)](./blockly.blockrendering.bottomrow.hasrightsquarecorner.md) |  | Returns whether or not the bottom row has a right square corner. |
